techniqueDifficultyExplanation: The workout type is classified as 'drive,' which on the Hydrow platform typically requires advanced technique due to the intensity and precision needed for high-speed intervals. The sprint and max pace rowing also demand good coordination and control, which align with an Advanced level.
effortDifficultyExplanation: The workout consists of 90-second intervals with sprints, followed by a max pace push, contributing to high energy expenditure. The 21-minute duration with 3 out of 3 intensity levels makes it physically demanding, thus aligning with Challenging to Extreme effort levels.
requiredFitnessLevelExplanation: The workoutType is 'Drive', which is explicitly defined as a Advanced workout based on platform rules. No further inference needed.
